com.mparticle.commerce

Class CommerceApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mparticle.commerce.CommerceApi

  • public class CommerceApi
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class used to access the shopping Cart and to log CommerceEvents

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommerceApi(android.content.Context context) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void checkout()
      Log a CommerceEvent with the Product.CHECKOUT action, including the Products that are currently in the Cart.

      Log a CommerceEvent with the Product.CHECKOUT action, including the Products that are currently in the Cart.

      Log a CommerceEvent with the Product.PURCHASE action for the Products that are currently in the Cart.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommerceApi

        public CommerceApi(android.content.Context context)

    • Method Detail

      • checkout

        public void checkout(int step,
                     java.lang.String options)
        Log a CommerceEvent with the Product.CHECKOUT action, including the Products that are currently in the Cart. You should call Cart.add(Product) prior to this method.
        Parameters:
        step - the checkout progress/step for apps that have a multi-step checkout process
        options - a label to associate with the checkout event

      • checkout

        public void checkout()
        Log a CommerceEvent with the Product.CHECKOUT action, including the Products that are currently in the Cart. You should call Cart.add(Product) prior to this method.

      • purchase

        public void purchase(TransactionAttributes attributes)
        Log a CommerceEvent with the Product.PURCHASE action for the Products that are currently in the Cart. By default, this method will *not* clear the cart. You must manually call Cart.clear(). You should call Cart.add(Product) prior to this method.
        Parameters:
        attributes - the attributes to associate with this purchase

      • purchase

        public void purchase(TransactionAttributes attributes,
                     boolean clearCart)
        Log a CommerceEvent with the Product.PURCHASE action for the Products that are currently in the Cart. You should call Cart.add(Product) prior to this method.
        Parameters:
        attributes - the attributes to associate with this purchase
        clearCart - boolean determining if the cart should remove its contents after the purchase

      • refund

        public void refund(TransactionAttributes attributes,
                   boolean clearCart)
        Log a CommerceEvent with the Product.REFUND action for the Products that are currently in the Cart.
        Parameters:
        attributes - the attributes to associate with this refund. Typically at least the transaction ID is required.
